section.title: openedx.core.djangoapps.video_pipeline.api module
section.paragraph: API utils in order to communicate to edx-video-pipeline.

desc_content.paragraph: Sends transcript credentials to video pipeline
Updates the 3rd party transcription service’s credentials. Credentials are updated for all the enabled pipelines.

field_body.paragraph: credentials_payload (dict) – A payload containing org, provider and its credentials.
A Boolean specifying whether the credentials were updated or not and an error response received from pipeline.

desc_content.paragraph: Note: If one of the pipeline fails to update the credentials, False is returned, meaning that credentials were not updated and both calls should be tried again.

A wrapper for a deferred-loading field. When the value is read from this object the first time, the query is executed.
Looks at the currently active configuration model to determine whether the VideoUploadsEnabledByDefault feature is available.
If the feature flag is not enabled, the feature is not available. If the flag is enabled for all the courses, feature is available. If the flag is enabled and the provided course_id is for a course

block_quote.paragraph: with CourseVideoUploadsEnabledByDefault enabled, then the feature is available.

field_body.paragraph: course_id (CourseKey) – course id for whom feature will be checked.

desc_content.paragraph: A wrapper for a deferred-loading field. When the value is read from this object the first time, the query is executed.
Returns an API client which can be used to make Video Pipeline API requests.
